results.title: IgA nephropathy in a boy with frequently relapsing nephrotic syndrome.
results.text_hl: Currently (14 years old), @CHEMICAL_Cyclosporine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D016572 @@@CyA@@@ treatment has been discontinued and the @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ is undergoing @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ therapy for @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgA nephropathy@@@, but there are still relapses of @DISEASE_Nephrotic_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D009404 @@@NS@@@.

citations.NLM: Ichikawa Y, Horinouchi T, Tanaka Y, Ueda C, Kitakado H, Kondo A, Sakakibara N, Yoshikawa N, Nozu K. IgA nephropathy in a boy with frequently relapsing nephrotic syndrome. CEN Case Rep. 2023 Apr 24;():. PMID: 37088833
citations.BibTeX: @article{37088833, title={IgA nephropathy in a boy with frequently relapsing nephrotic syndrome.}, author={Ichikawa Y and Horinouchi T and Tanaka Y and Ueda C and Kitakado H and Kondo A and Sakakibara N and Yoshikawa N and Nozu K}, journal={CEN Case Rep}}

results.title: Nephropathy in a Child with Severe Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa Treated with Cyclophosphamide: A Case Report
results.text_hl: We initially treated our case with adequate doses of @CHEMICAL_Prednisone @CHEMICAL_MESH:D011241 @@@prednisone@@@ and @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@. A clinical trial demonstrated that a once-daily dose of 0.4 mg/kg @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ is effective and safe for children with primary @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgAN@@@.

citations.NLM: Ambarsari CG, Palupi-Baroto R, Sinuraya FAG, Suryati E, Widyastuti E, Widhiati S. Nephropathy in a Child with Severe Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa Treated with Cyclophosphamide: A Case Report Case Rep Nephrol Dial. 2023 Jan-Dec;13(1):75-83. PMID: 37484797
citations.BibTeX: @article{37484797, title={Nephropathy in a Child with Severe Recessive Dystrophic Epidermolysis Bullosa Treated with Cyclophosphamide: A Case Report}, author={Ambarsari CG and Palupi-Baroto R and Sinuraya FAG and Suryati E and Widyastuti E and Widhiati S}, journal={Case Rep Nephrol Dial}, volume={13}, number={1}, pages={75-83}}

results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Lisinopril@@@ versus @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ and @CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ for mild childhood @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgA nephropathy@@@: a randomized controlled trial (JSKDC01 study).

results.title: Efficacy and safety of lisinopril for mild childhood IgA nephropathy: a pilot study.
authors: Japanese Pediatric IgA Nephropathy Treatment Study Group
results.text_hl: Efficacy and safety of @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ for mild childhood @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgA nephropathy@@@: a pilot study.

results.title: Randomized controlled trial of mycophenolate mofetil in children, adolescents, and adults with IgA nephropathy.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: @CHEMICAL_Mycophenolic_Acid @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009173 @@@MMF@@@ did not reduce @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ significantly in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgAN@@@ who had persistent @DISEASE_Proteinuria @DISEASE_MESH:D011507 @@@proteinuria@@@ after @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@/@CHEMICAL_Losartan @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019808 @@@losartan@@@ plus @CHEMICAL_Omacor @CHEMICAL_MESH:C405603 @@@Omacor@@@.

results.title: Atypical Presentation of IgA Nephropathy Mimicking Acute Pyelonephritis
results.text_hl: A kidney biopsy confirmed a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Glomerulonephritis_IGA</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D005922 @@@IgA nephropathy@@@.
